Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.AbstractController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.LoginController
public class LoginController extends AbstractController
Class representing Login controller. It manages the login and notifies the user if it is successful or not.

      public void failedLogin()
      Notifies the user that the login failed, either the user is already connected or the nickname is already used.

      Jump directly to GameController.

    • login

      public void login(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sends the username inserted by the client to the GUInterface.
      Parameters:
      event - The loginButton has been clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - Error in I/O with the username field.

    • disconnectionInLauncher

      Notifies the client that has been disconnected from the server while being in the GUILauncher.

    • reconnectionInLauncher

      public void reconnectionInLauncher()
      Shows an alert informing that you reconnected to game you were connected to.
